title: Yishen Huazhuo decoction regulates microglial polarization to reduce Alzheimer's disease-related neuroinflammation through TREM2
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Kai Wang, Shujie Zan, Jiachun Xu, Weiming Sun, Caixia Li, Wei Zhang, Daoyan Ni, Ruzhen Cheng, Lin Li, Zhen Yu, Linlin Zhang, Shuang Liu, Yuanwu Cui, Yulian Zhang
